title: Zombie Seed
description: Zombie Seed is a fast paced series that delivers on everything you expect from the genre while throwing in exciting twists that you won't see coming. These zombies are anything but "slow" which adds extra chaos for those trying to traverse the new post-apocalyptic landscape. Prepare yourself for a compelling story filled with action and enough suspense to keep you reading all the way to the end.
author: P.M. Barnes
